title: How Farmers Harvest Eggplants in a Greenhouse: Modern Growing Techniques | Farming Documentary

tasks.task: Visiting and viewing a modern greenhouse for eggplant cultivation
subtasks: Observing the size and design of the greenhouse facility
Learning about the state-of-the-art technology used in the greenhouses
Understanding the use of hydroponic systems for nutrient delivery
Watching the automated pesticide spraying system in action
Observing the seedling care and transfer process to the main greenhouse
Noting the plant support systems and the use of hanging wires
Monitoring the plant monitoring system for growth assessment
Watching the harvesting process using automated platforms
Observing the grading and processing of harvested eggplants
Appreciating the variety of eggplant products such as Capitina Dianine
Recognizing the future implications of greenhouse farming for agriculture
